LanguageData.SmartHarvestOrganTax_Designator_Desc: Drag over imprisoned pawns to schedule optimal organ harvesting.
LanguageData.SmartHarvestOrganTax_Setting_LeftFirst_D: If checked, the left Organs will be harvested first.
LanguageData.SmartHarvestOrganTax_Setting_IsChangeMed: If checked, the medication restrictions will be automatically changed after selection
